title: How to Make a Sweet Cream Cake

steps.headline: Grease and flour one 9-inch square baking pan or two 8-inch layer cake pans.
Add eggs to a mixing bowl and beat until thick, about 5 minutes.
Add sugar gradually to the beaten eggs making sure to beat the mixture well between additions of sugar.
Add the dry ingredients to a separate bowl and whisk together.
Add the dry ingredients, alternately with the cream, to the egg mixture.
Pour the batter evenly in the cake pan(s).
Bake the 9-inch cake layer for 40 to 45 minutes or the 8-inch cake layers for 25 to 35 minutes.
Top cake layers with cinnamon-sugar about 3 minutes before the cakes test done.

text: Preheat your oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Grease and flour one 9-inch square baking pan or two 8-inch layer cake pans.  Add eggs to a mixing bowl and beat until thick, about 5 minutes.  Add sugar gradually to the beaten eggs making sure to beat the mixture well between additions of sugar.  Add the dry ingredients to a separate bowl and whisk together.  Add the dry ingredients, alternately with the cream, to the egg mixture.  Stir to combine.  Scrape the bowl, if needed.  Pour the batter evenly in the cake pan(s).  Bake the 9-inch cake layer for 40 to 45 minutes or the 8-inch cake layers for 25 to 35 minutes.  Top cake layers with cinnamon-sugar about 3 minutes before the cakes test done.
sentences: Grease and flour one 9-inch square baking pan or two 8-inch layer cake pans.
Add eggs to a mixing bowl and beat until thick, about 5 minutes.
Add sugar gradually to the beaten eggs making sure to beat the mixture well between additions of sugar.
Add the dry ingredients to a separate bowl and whisk together.
Add the dry ingredients, alternately with the cream, to the egg mixture.
Pour the batter evenly in the cake pan(s).
Bake the 9-inch cake layer for 40 to 45 minutes or the 8-inch cake layers for 25 to 35 minutes.
Top cake layers with cinnamon-sugar about 3 minutes before the cakes test done.
